ComicInfo.Summary:
The final issue of the “Ash in Space” saga! Ash may be lost in space, but his responsibilities as the Chosen One have followed him! The Deadites have launched a satellite that will broadcast their evil influence all over Earth. And before Ash can stop them, he has to find his way off a space station that is coming apart – explosively – around his ears!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Gabriel Hardman & Jordan Boyd | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Tim Seeley & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Nacho Tenorio & Sergio Mora | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 4 | E/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Tim Seeley | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Nacho Tenorio | 6 |
